remarks: Lemma for ~ pnt .  Closure for the constants used in the proof.  For comparison with Equation 10.6.27 of [Shapiro], p. 434, ` U ` is α, ` E ` is ε, and ` K ` is _K_.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2016.)
statement:
pntlem1.r $e |- R = ( a e. RR+ |-> ( ( psi ` a ) - a ) ) $.
pntlem1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
pntlem1.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
pntlem1.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( 0 (,) 1 ) ) $.
pntlem1.d $e |- D = ( A + 1 ) $.
pntlem1.f $e |- F = ( ( 1 - ( 1 / D ) ) x. ( ( L / ( ; 3 2 x. B ) ) / ( D ^ 2 ) ) ) $.
pntlem1.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. RR+ ) $.
pntlem1.u2 $e |- ( ph -> U <_ A ) $.
pntlem1.e $e |- E = ( U / D ) $.
pntlem1.k $e |- K = ( exp ` ( B / E ) ) $.
pntlemc $p |- ( ph -> ( E e. RR+ /\ K e. RR+ /\ ( E e. ( 0 (,) 1 ) /\ 1 < K /\ ( U - E ) e. RR+ ) ) ) $.
$d E a $.
